tool.name: generate_3D_surface_plot
tool.description: Generates a surface plot from a 3D synthetic image.
tool.help:
**Description**
The 3D surface plot tool generates a surface plot from a 3D synthetic image.
-----
**Inputs**
- 3D Synthetic Image - View Angle on x-Direction - View Angle on y-Direction - Alpha-Value
-----
**Output**
- A PNG (.png) file of the surface plot
-----
**Example**
The 3D surface plot tool displays the following image using demo3D00 and the default parameters:
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png :height: 250 :target: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/icaoberg/cellorganizer-galaxy-tools/dev/tools/cellorganizer/images/surface_plot.png
